LanguageData.SHODANSetting_CD_MoodDebuffDesc: Sets the debuff a pawn gets if they gain an implant or additional part at or beyond the industrial tech level.
LanguageData.SHODANSetting_CD_ChancePerImplantDesc: Sets how more likely SHODAN will assert control with each additional industrial added part or implant.
LanguageData.SHODANSetting_CD_BrainImplantForceDesc: Toggle if a brain implant will guarantee SHODAN's domination.
LanguageData.SHODANSetting_CD_ImplantExtractChanceDes: Set the probability a pawn will drop an implant/added part when they are disassembled/butchered.
LanguageData.SHODANSetting_CD_ComponentPropDesc: If disassembly/butchering fails to extract an implant, the extraction process will instead return the components used to make it.\n\nThis setting determines what proportion of those components will drop.
LanguageData.SHODANSetting_CS_MTBHackDesc: Set the average number of days before SHODAN hacks a power trading building.
LanguageData.SHODANSetting_CS_MTBSubversionDesc: Set the average number of days before SHODAN tries a subversion incident.
LanguageData.SHODANSetting_CS_BasePowerFactorDesc: Sets how much more or less power a building generates or consumes respectively by default.
LanguageData.SHODANSetting_CS_PowerFlatDesc: Sets the flat power requirement debuff for hacked buildings.
LanguageData.SHODANSetting_CS_HeatPushDesc: Determines how much heat gets pushed each time a building is damaged during the Overclock game condition.
LanguageData.SHODANSetting_CS_OverloadBoomChanceDesc: Sets how likely each individual building is going to explode when the Overload incident fires.
